name: Moonlight Mayhem
description:
Moonlight Mayhem is a 4-15 player multiplayer horror game. The objective is to find and kill the werewolves infiltrated among the players. These are designated at the start of the game and their goal is to eliminate the other players without being noticed. Many items are available throughout the map to spice up the game.





Play with your friends from 4 to 15 players.



Play as the enemy side and try to eliminate everyone.



Customize your character.
